mapper.insert: insert into board_star ( board_id, board_star_type, board_star_short_review, board_star_rating, sort_no ) values ( #{boardId}, #{boardStarType}, #{boardStarShortReview}, #{boardStarRating}, #{sortNo} )
mapper.select: select board_id, board_star_type, board_star_short_review, board_star_rating from board_star where board_id = #{boardId} order By sort_no
